name: Lost Rocket (Hot_Games)
description:
This is a Lost Rocket game!
Here you have to complete 30 challenging levels!
A small rocket is in your hands!
The rocket flies through various locations in an attempt to reach the green platform, if it reaches, it is a victory and you will have to pass another difficult level!
Only a few will pass all the levels of the game!
If you can complete all 30 levels, you can consider yourself the most skilled player!!!
